dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 5135 IH: Train Crew Choice Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Burlison introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To nullify a final rule on train crew size safety requirements published by the Federal Railroad Administration.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Train Crew Choice Act.

section.header: Nullification of final rule on train crew size safety requirements
section.text: The final rule published in the Federal Register on April 9, 2024 by the Federal Railroad Administration titled Train Crew Size Safety Requirements (89 Fed. Reg. 25052) shall have no force or effect.
